argSrc: One should not re-introduce capital punishment in Germany,
argTrg: since no one can claim the right to rule over the life or death of another human being.

argSrc: One should not re-introduce capital punishment in Germany,
argTrg: Capital punishment will not deter anyone else from an atrocity.

argTrg: Everyone must be given the chance to hone their conscience and possibly make amends for their deed.
